data.title: Salvatore Quasimodo Eng
data.meta_description: Salvatore Quasimodo Eng - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Salvatore Quasimodo was an Italian author and poet who won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1959. He was born in Sicily in 1901 and published his first collection of poems in 1930. Quasimodo is considered one of the foremost Italian poets of the 20th century along with Giuseppe Ungaretti and Eugenio Montale. He received many honors and awards over his career and traveled widely giving lectures until his death in 1968.
